rows.label: qst630203_msg0001
rows.name:
So, you're looking for a fierce hat,
is that right?

rows.label: qst630203_msg0002
rows.name: Y-y-yes...? I mean, yes, yes I am...

rows.label: qst630203_msg0003
rows.name:
Something wrong? You seem a lot less
pushy all of a sudden...

rows.label: qst630203_msg0004
rows.name: You're not...afraid of me, are you?

rows.label: qst630203_msg0005
rows.name: N-n-no...? I mean, no ma'am...

rows.label: qst630203_msg0006
rows.name: Seriously...?

rows.label: qst630203_msg0007
rows.name:
Look, do you want me to make you
a hat or not?

rows.label: qst630203_msg0008
rows.name:
Make me a hat?! ...You don't mean
turn me into one, do you...?

rows.label: qst630203_msg0009
rows.name: Don't be stupid.

rows.label: qst630203_msg0010
rows.name:
You shouldn't judge people, you know.
Weaving just so happens to be a hobby
of mine.

rows.label: qst630203_msg0011
rows.name: Ha...haha... You're kidding, right?

rows.label: qst630203_msg0012
rows.name: I'm dead serious.

rows.label: qst630203_msg0013
rows.name: Urk...

rows.label: qst630203_msg0014
rows.name: Did you have to say "dead" just then...?

rows.label: qst630203_msg0015
rows.name:
Anyway, no disrespect, ma'am, but...
I don't think a black spiky hat would
suit my, er, complexion so well...

rows.label: qst630203_msg0016
rows.name: That's not what I'm offering.

rows.label: qst630203_msg0017
rows.name: Just tell me what you're after.

rows.label: qst630203_msg0018
rows.name: A hat that would match this outfit...

rows.label: qst630203_msg0019
rows.name: Something simple, but graceful...

rows.label: qst630203_msg0020
rows.name: ...Something like that maybe?

rows.label: qst630203_msg0021
rows.name:
Right.
Sure, I'll have a go.

rows.label: qst630203_msg0022
rows.name:
Oh, and maybe...
You could add some high-end
touches and a whiff of luxury...?

rows.label: qst630203_msg0023
rows.name: You're pushing your luck there, boo...

rows.label: qst630203_msg0101
rows.name: Think you can do it, Mei?

rows.label: qst630203_msg0201
rows.name: Sound doable, Mei?

rows.label: qst630203_msg0301
rows.name: Mei, does that sound feasible?

rows.label: qst630203_msg0401
rows.name: Are you really gonna do it, Mei?

rows.label: qst630203_msg0501
rows.name: I think I'll manage.

rows.label: qst630203_msg0502
rows.name: But I might need an extra set of hands.

rows.label: qst630203_msg0503
rows.name:
We'll see. For now, let's head back
to the old lady's house in Iyasaki.
